record.title: RECESS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand in recess until 2:15 p.m. this afternoon.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 12:24 p.m., recessed until 2:15 p.m. and reassembled when called to order by the Presiding Officer (Mr. Carper).
record.chair: The Senator from California is recognized.
